articles.author: Owen Jarus
articles.title: 160,000-year-old sophisticated stone tools discovered in China may not have been made by Homo sapiens - Live Science
articles.description: Archaeologists have found the oldest known evidence of hafted tools in East Asia, and they challenge a previously held assumption about stone tool use.
articles.content:
Archaeologists have found that early humans in what is now China were using sophisticated stone tools as far back as 160,000 years ago.
"This discovery challenges the perception that stone tool tech… [+6133 chars]
